name: Feedran, the Winds of Mischief
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; change its battle position, then, return this card to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Feedran, the Winds of Mischief" once per turn.
